verses.verse: And Joshua<WH3091> the son<WH1121> of Nun<WH5126> sent<WH7971> out of Shittim<WH7851> two<WH8147> men<WH582> to spy<WH7270> secretly,<WH2791> saying,<WH559> Go<WH3212> view<WH7200> the land,<WH776> even Jericho.<WH3405> And they went,<WH3212> and came<WH935> into an harlot's<WH2181> house,<WH1004> named<WH8034> Rahab,<WH7343> and lodged<WH7901> there.<WH8033>

And it was told<WH559> the king<WH4428> of Jericho,<WH3405> saying,<WH559> Behold,<WH2009> there came<WH935> men<WH582> in here to night<WH3915> of the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> to search<WH2658> out the country.<WH776>

And the king<WH4428> of Jericho<WH3405> sent<WH7971> to Rahab,<WH7343> saying,<WH559> Bring<WH3318> forth<WH3318> the men<WH582> that are come<WH935> to you, which<WH834> are entered<WH935> into your house:<WH1004> for they be come<WH935> to search<WH2658> out all<WH3605> the country.<WH776>

And the woman<WH802> took<WH3947> the two<WH8147> men,<WH582> and hid<WH6845> them, and said<WH559> thus,<WH3651> There came<WH935> men<WH582> to me, but I knew<WH3045> not from where<WH370> they were:

And it came<WH1961> to pass about the time of shutting<WH5462> of the gate,<WH8179> when it was dark,<WH2822> that the men<WH582> went<WH3318> out: where<WH575> the men<WH582> went<WH1980> I know<WH3045> not: pursue<WH7291> after<WH310> them quickly;<WH4118> for you shall overtake<WH5381> them.
But she had brought<WH5927> them up to the roof<WH1406> of the house, and hid<WH2934> them with the stalks<WH6086> of flax,<WH6593> which she had laid in order<WH6186> on the roof.<WH1406>

And the men<WH582> pursued<WH7291> after<WH310> them the way<WH1870> to Jordan<WH3383> to the fords:<WH4569> and as soon<WH834> as they which<WH834> pursued<WH7291> after<WH310> them were gone<WH3318> out, they shut<WH5462> the gate.<WH8179>
And before<WH2962> they were laid<WH7901> down,<WH7901> she came<WH5927> up to them on the roof;<WH1406>

And she said<WH559> to the men,<WH582> I know<WH3045> that the LORD<WH3068> has given<WH5414> you the land,<WH776> and that your terror<WH367> is fallen<WH5307> on us, and that all<WH3605> the inhabitants<WH3427> of the land<WH776> faint<WH4127> because<WH6440> of you.

For we have heard<WH8085> how<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> dried<WH3001> up the water<WH4325> of the Red<WH5488> sea<WH3220> for you, when you came<WH3318> out of Egypt;<WH4714> and what<WH834> you did<WH6213> to the two<WH8147> kings<WH4428> of the Amorites,<WH567> that were on the other<WH5676> side<WH5676> Jordan,<WH3383> Sihon<WH5511> and Og,<WH5747> whom<WH834> <WH853> you utterly destroyed.<WH2763>

And as soon as we had heard<WH8085> these things, our hearts<WH3824> did melt,<WH4549> neither<WH3808> did there remain<WH6965> any more<WH5750> courage<WH7307> in any man,<WH376> because<WH6440> of you: for the LORD<WH3068> your God,<WH430> he is God<WH430> in heaven<WH8064> above,<WH4605> and in earth<WH776> beneath.<WH8478>

Now<WH6258> therefore, I pray<WH4994> you, swear<WH7650> to me by the LORD,<WH3068> since<WH3588> I have showed<WH6213> you kindness,<WH2617> that you will also<WH1571> show<WH6213> kindness<WH2617> to my father's<WH1> house,<WH1004> and give<WH5414> me a true<WH571> token:<WH226>

And that you will save<WH2421> alive<WH2421> my father,<WH1> and my mother,<WH517> and my brothers,<WH251> and my sisters,<WH269> and all<WH3605> that they have, and deliver<WH5337> our lives<WH5315> from death.<WH4194>

And the men<WH582> answered<WH559> her, Our life<WH5315> for yours, if<WH518> you utter<WH5046> not this<WH2088> our business.<WH1697> And it shall be, when the LORD<WH3068> has given<WH5414> us the land,<WH776> that we will deal<WH6213> kindly<WH2617> and truly<WH571> with you.
Then she let<WH3381> them down<WH3381> by a cord<WH2256> through<WH1157> the window:<WH2474> for her house<WH1004> was on the town<WH7023> wall,<WH2346> and she dwelled<WH3427> on the wall.<WH2346>

And she said<WH559> to them, Get<WH3212> you to the mountain,<WH2022> lest<WH6435> the pursuers<WH7291> meet<WH6293> you; and hide<WH2247> yourselves there<WH8033> three<WH7969> days,<WH3117> until<WH5704> the pursuers<WH7291> be returned:<WH7725> and afterward<WH310> may you go<WH3212> your way.<WH1870>
And the men<WH582> said<WH559> to her, We will be blameless<WH5355> of this<WH2088> your oath<WH7621> which<WH834> you have made us swear.<WH7650>

Behold,<WH2009> when we come<WH935> into the land,<WH776> you shall bind<WH7194> this<WH2088> line<WH8615> of scarlet<WH8144> thread<WH2339> in the window<WH2474> which<WH834> you did let<WH3381> us down<WH3381> by: and you shall bring<WH622> your father,<WH1> and your mother,<WH517> and your brothers,<WH251> and all<WH3605> your father's<WH1> household,<WH1004> home<WH1004> to you.

And it shall be, that whoever<WH3605> <WH834> shall go<WH3318> out of the doors<WH1817> of your house<WH1004> into the street,<WH2351> his blood<WH1818> shall be on his head,<WH7218> and we will be guiltless:<WH5355> and whoever<WH3605> <WH834> shall be with you in the house,<WH1004> his blood<WH1818> shall be on our head,<WH7218> if<WH518> any hand<WH3027> be on him.
And if<WH518> you utter<WH5046> this<WH2088> our business,<WH1697> then we will be quit<WH5355> of your oath<WH7621> which<WH834> you have made us to swear.<WH7650>

And she said,<WH559> According to your words,<WH1697> so<WH3651> be it. And she sent<WH7971> them away, and they departed:<WH3212> and she bound<WH7194> the scarlet<WH8144> line<WH8615> in the window.<WH2474>

And they went,<WH3212> and came<WH935> to the mountain,<WH2022> and stayed<WH3427> there<WH8033> three<WH7969> days,<WH3117> until<WH5704> the pursuers<WH7291> were returned:<WH7725> and the pursuers<WH7291> sought<WH1245> them throughout all<WH3605> the way,<WH1870> but found<WH4672> them not.

So the two<WH8147> men<WH582> returned,<WH7725> and descended<WH3381> from the mountain,<WH2022> and passed<WH5674> over,<WH5674> and came<WH935> to Joshua<WH3091> the son<WH1121> of Nun,<WH5126> and told<WH5608> him all<WH3605> things that befell<WH4672> them:

And they said<WH559> to Joshua,<WH3091> Truly<WH3588> the LORD<WH3068> has delivered<WH5414> into our hands<WH3027> all<WH3605> the land;<WH776> for even<WH1571> all<WH3605> the inhabitants<WH3427> of the country<WH776> do faint<WH4127> because<WH6440> of us.
